titles.title: Military Spouses Retirement Security Act
Military Spouses Retirement Security Act
Military Spouses Retirement Security Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit to small employers for covering military spouses under retirement plans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Military Spouses Retirement Security Act
This bill allows a tax credit for certain small businesses that include military spouses in their retirement plans.
